content.webTitle: Santa Cruz picks up speed on the road to recovery

fields.headline: Santa Cruz picks up speed on the road to recovery
fields.bodyText: Roque Santa Cruz says his fitness is continuing to improve before Saturday's England game. "I am not yet 100% but I am moving well and trying to coordinate my movements with the rest of the team," the striker said. "We will see what will happen in the next few days. It is important I've started working with the team."
